Home How To Courses Answers Search Arby's Tweet Arby's is a fast food restaurant chain that features roast beef sandwiches and is found in 48 states and five countries. It has a variety of menu items in addition to roast beef such as chicken sandwiches and sides. It has positioned itself as a more adult fast food establishment in contrast to McDonald's and Burger King .
On September 29 , 2008 , Triarc Companies Inc. merged with Wendy's International, Inc. to form Wendy's/Arby's Group, it is the third largest fast food restaurant company in the United States . http://www.arbys.com/about/
On April 9 , 2010 , Arbyâ€™s Restaurant Group, Inc. made a national launch of a new Value Menu, adding more lower priced items to its menu that will be supported by new advertising creative. http://finance.yahoo.com/news/Arbys-Launches-National-Value-bw-3301501486.html?x=0&.v=1
A.R.B.Y.S
When the Raffel Brothers were thinking up a name for their fledgling business, they settled on the initials R.B. which stands for Raffel Brothers. It also stands for roast beef, and in the 1980s , marketers turned the entire Arby's name into an acronym for "America's Roast Beef, Yes Sir."
